caption.p: Natural isolates applied as food additives or perfume ingredients: ( 29) 4-methylguaiacol, ( 30) α-pinene, ( 31) β-pinene, ( 32) α-bisabolene, ( 33) methyl anthranilate, ( 34) methyl N-methylanthranilate, ( 35) benzyl acetate, ( 36) γ-octalactone, ( 37) γ-decalactone, ( 38) γ-undecalactone, ( 39) 2-phenylethanol, ( 40) geraniol, ( 41) cedrol, ( 42) α-santanol, ( 43) β-santanol.
